title: LFT G5 Mid/ADC main
body:
Hey all!
Looking to find a semi-competitive team to play with. 
I main ADC/Mid and have a HUUUUGEEEEE Champion pool. I've been playing since Noc release so... a long time now.
Been struggling in solo queue because I'm starting to play more team-based champions more often and yeah, you all know what its like. 
I can play all of the roles, and played in a few competitions as a support during S3/S4. 
My favourite champs at the moment are Graves, Janna, Nidalee and LB.
If you're looking for someone to try out, let me know. I'm free every night except Saturdays after 10 (Vic time)

**I AM A R 0 B 0 T**
> {{champion:104}} Dead Man Walking
